website_summaries.verdict: At 16 inches by 14 inches, this small pedestal sink provides a classic look with polished construction.
pros: Size is perfect for smaller bathrooms
Good quality sink that has clean, classic lines
Fits the decor and style of older homes
cons: Does have holes for a wall mount, but does not come with a bracket

customer_reviews.title: Like the sink a lot
customer_reviews.text: Like the sink a lot, good quality. Perfect for a tiny bathroom. Would have given 5 stars, but more complicated to install than most pedestal sinks.... Mine didn't come with a wall mount bracket, but it does have two holes in the back where screws/bolts can be installed to hold the sink to the wall. Was a little more work to install it, but I still would buy another one if needed for a small bath.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink for my tiny 1888 farmhouse bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect small sink for a tiny bathroom! I needed a sink for my 1888 farmhouse and this sink is gorgeous, fits the decor, and is the perfect size. I am extremely pleased with my purchase and the seller packed my sink perfectly so that it arrived in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Weidknecht

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sink like this we have purchased. Love the size, and the space it allows in a small bathroom. Perfect for washing hands, brushing teeth, or washing face, yet it leaves room to put supplies in a rack in the corner to give you room around the sink. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Small size is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, no damage all pieces in tact. Perfect size for a converted bathroom under the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great small pedestal sink for the money.
customer_reviews.text: First, the packing and shipping got a 2 piece pedestal sink to me, in 2 pieces! Not cracked, chipped, it arrived in perfect shape, and that’s a trick getting across this country and then to middle-of-nowhere, Montana. The sink itself was just what I needed for a tiny half-bath, basically a converted closet. The 4 stars for easy to install was only because the sink is small with the area to hide intake pipes is only 7 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: organiciron

customer_reviews.title: This petite pedestal sink really fits and makes the tiny half-bath look perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We had an extremely small space to work with, and a normal 19" vanity was too big. This small pedestal sink is just right for the proportion of the room. It makes everything look like it really belongs there.
customer_reviews.author: I stacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink if you need one in a small space. It took 3 to get one that was not cracked or defective. The did ship out quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed a very small sink for a very small powder room and this fit the bill perfectly. It does arrive in two pieces, nicely packaged, no damage. Very nice quality and a good value. Install was easy too. Even though it is super small, the style shines through.
customer_reviews.author: llgmorrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: We have a tiny guest toilet that had a regular sized pedestal sink. It took up half the space. Granted, anyone using it shouldn't be in there for a long visit, but it they also shouldn't have to back into the room:) This took half the footprint of the overly large sink and now the room looks twice the size. The bowl, while not overly large, has a decent depth to it, allowing for a good hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Baker

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a very small bathroom. Hired a Plummer to install as the pipes needed to be moved to fit inside pedestal. The faucet did come with drain I didn’t know that and ordered a drain. Would recommend this sink
customer_reviews.author: Shane g.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pedestal sink for my small half bath.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the size pedestal sink I needed for our powder room!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Garcia Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our small bathroom. You can't get better quality for the money. If you are limited in space in a powder room or small bathroom, this pedestal sink is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SF from LA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small bathroom. I was very happy that it fit the narrow footprint we had in our guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan S

customer_reviews.title: Great little sink
customer_reviews.text: This is only small sink we were able to find anywhere and it will look great once it is installed. However this one did arrive with a small defect and I called the company and it was taken care of immediately. I would definitely deal with this company again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie Buwalda

customer_reviews.title: Classic design, quality finish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small space. Definitely be mindful of the faucet you intend to pair it with as the basin is small, but it is great quality and will work out well in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hellesto

customer_reviews.title: Great small sink for cramped spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice small sink which fit perfectly in one of our small bathrooms. It came very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It did not include a bracket to hold the sink's ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not include a bracket to hold the sink's bowl to the wall. Instead, we had to caulk it in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the clean
customer_reviews.text: I needed a very small pedestal sink to replace a bathroom vanity in my tiny bathroom that is being remodeled. I love the clean, classic lines of this one. Thank you for fast, dependable shipping, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this looks in the bathroom. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: RainierRandy

customer_reviews.title: Love how nice it looks and how little space it uses.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small bathroom. This sink freed up a lot of space. I will say it has a very small basin but it is exactly what I wanted. Its perfect for a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: Great little sink
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small sink for a half bath and this one was perfect. It's attractive, has a deep bowl and the finish on the porcelain was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: JHJH

customer_reviews.title: Right sink for small space
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small sink for a small bathroom and this baby foots the bill nicely. Well made and the install was straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 1/2 bath needed great little sink for small spaces. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ken holland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality beautiful sink easy to install very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sine A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The product dimensions were accurate and the sinks fit as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is very, good, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: The size was the right size for the space and ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was the right size for the space and it looks elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink
customer_reviews.text: Not installed yet, but very nice for a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: third rate sink wont be doing business with this company again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ondine 16" Small Pedestal Bathroom Sink White With Overflow With Pre-Drilled Centerset Faucet Holes Heavy Duty Porcelain Renovators Supply Manufacturing
product_meta.description: The Ondine pedestal sink from Renovator's Supply features a compact design and sleek lines to keep your bathroom spacious and beautiful. Features: - The Ondine is a space-conscious pedestal basin sink. - Open-back sink pedestal sinks save space in your bathroom and make installation a breeze. - Constructed from gorgeous Grade A vitreous china porcelain for durability and easy cleanup. - Reno-Gloss finish protects from scratches and stains. - Authentic Renovator's Supply logo guarantees better quality than the knockoffs. Dimensions: - OVERALL: 33" Tall x 16" Wide x 14" Proj. - BASIN: 5" Deep x 13" Wide x 9" Proj. Hardware: - Accepts an 4" Centerset Faucet (Faucet not included). - 1-3/4"" drain hole (not included). Other Details: - Design Inspirations: Space saving designs and luxurious modern bathrooms. What's Included: - One (1) Ondine Porcelain Pedestal Sink
feature_bullets: Small White Pedestal Sink Spacing Saving Ondine Design
Dimensions: 33" Tall x 16" Wide x 14" Proj.
Heavy Duty Porcelain Scratch and Stain Resistant
Pre-Drilled Centerset Faucet Holes and Overflow to Avoid Water Damage
Perfect for Half Baths or Small Tight Bathroom Spaces and Mid-Size Bath
